channel.title: 718 Law Runes Required

item.title: 718 Law Runes Required
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

I’m trying to set up that if you use an interface, and options come up to teleport you need law runes to use it, otherwise you can’t use it.

Here is what i mean:

		if(componentId == OPTION_1) {
			Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(3373, 3090, 0));
			end();
		}

When Option 1 is selected, I want it to check for Law runes (10 of them), If they have 10 law runes, they will teleport, If they do not, It will not work and will tell you, you need 10 law runes.

I’ve tried adding contains item codes but it still gives me errors.

would appreciate it if someone could help me get it to work.

Read full topic
